name: calendar-bot
description: Bot de slack que anuncia eventos usando el calendario de meetups

scripts.deploy: now alias $(now --name $INSTANCE_NAME -e APP_NAME=$APP_NAME -e BOTS_PATH=$BOTS_PATH -e CALENDAR_API_URL=$CALENDAR_API_URL -e CHANNEL=$CHANNEL -e INSTANCE_NAME=$INSTANCE_NAME -e NODE_ENV=production -e SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL=$SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL --npm --token $NOW_TOKEN) $INSTANCE_NAME --token=$NOW_TOKEN

author: durancristhian@gmail.com
